generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings and crosswalk lines, typical of a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and poles.
- building: Commercial buildings with storefronts and signs are visible along the right side of the road.
- pole: Several vertical poles, including traffic light poles and streetlight poles, are visible along the road.
- traffic sign: A green street sign with white lettering is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with bare branches are visible on the left side of the road.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a white SUV and a dark-colored sedan.
- truck: A yellow truck is visible on the far left side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- person: A person is visible standing near the motorcycle on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person standing near the motorcycle is considered a rider as they are associated with a motorized vehicle.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
